translations: 圆顶礼帽；投球手；玩滚球的人

sentences.sentence: He is the bowler-hatted figure in the foreground of Orpen's famous painting.
sentences.translation: 他就是奥彭名画的前景中那个戴圆顶礼帽的人物。

sentences.sentence: Bowler saw some companies holding back on negotiations this year to wait for a better picture of what 2010 holds.
sentences.translation: Bowler发现，一些企业今年不再参与协议，以等候2010年出现更好时机。

sentences.sentence: The nation which was once regarded as a buttoned-up bunch of repressives in bowler hats is now a land of incontinent alcoholics.
sentences.translation: 对此，英国媒体每日邮报评论：“我们这个国家，曾被认为是一群戴着圆顶礼帽、沉默寡言的被压抑的人，现在竟成了一岛的醉鬼。”
